title: binary
extract: Binary is nothing more than a System of Counting. Everything in a computer's brain comes down 0's & 1's. Binary existed before computers. Binary is an ON or OFF counting system, all or nothing. '1' represents ON, '0' represents OFF.Jun 22, 2018
extract_html: Binary is nothing more than a System of Counting. Everything in a computer's brain comes down 0's & 1's. Binary existed before computers. Binary is an ON or OFF counting system, all or nothing. '1' represents ON, '0' represents OFF.Jun 22, 2018
